entry.title: About Me
entry.content: About meHi, Iâ€™m Yunzhe Xu, a graduate student studying at Stevens Institute of Technology, in the greater New York area. I like programing, learning new technology is my passion. I want to be a web developing superhero and create awesome web applications in the future! What I knowFront-endHTML, CSS, JavaScript, ES6Bootstrap, React Back-endNodeJS, APIs, NoSQLJava, SQL AppAndroid Development Data AnalysisPython GameUnity What I am learning and want to learn Angular2, TypescriptVue, React Native, Electron, Swift I am writing some articles about what I learned in my blog. One for summarizing knowledge, another for sharing ideas. By the way, I am actively seeking for an internship or full time job recently. Feel free to contact me. Just send an email to xuyunzhe0607@gmail.com
